body:
```
[microbenchmarks] Performance differences noted:
Benchmark                                                                                     allocs_per_iteration    atm_add_per_iteration    locks_per_iteration    nows_per_iteration    writes_per_iteration
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  ----------------------  -----------------------  ---------------------  --------------------  ----------------------
BM_PumpStreamClientToServer<InProcessCHTTP2>/128M                                             -4%                     -6%
BM_PumpStreamClientToServer<InProcessCHTTP2>/2M                                               -15%                    -11%
BM_PumpStreamServerToClient<InProcessCHTTP2>/128M                                             -6%                     -9%
BM_PumpStreamServerToClient<InProcessCHTTP2>/2M                                               -16%                    -12%
BM_StreamingPingPong<InProcessCHTTP2, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/128M/1                        -16%                    -18%
BM_StreamingPingPong<InProcessCHTTP2, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/128M/2                        -5%                     -9%
BM_StreamingPingPongMsgs<InProcessCHTTP2, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/128M                      -11%                    -13%
BM_StreamingPingPongWithCoalescingApi<MinInProcessCHTTP2, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/128M/1/0  -9%                     -11%                     -5%                    -5%                   -6%
BM_StreamingPingPongWithCoalescingApi<MinInProcessCHTTP2, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/128M/1/1                          -4%                      -5%                    -5%                   -5%
BM_UnaryPingPong<InProcessCHTTP2, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/128M/0                            -16%                    -22%
BM_UnaryPingPong<InProcessCHTTP2, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/16M/0                             -7%                     -11%                     -4%
BM_UnaryPingPong<InProcessCHTTP2, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/2M/0                              -5%                     -4%
BM_UnaryPingPong<MinInProcessCHTTP2, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/128M/0                         -43%                    -51%                     -15%                   -12%                  -18%
BM_UnaryPingPong<MinInProcessCHTTP2, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/16M/0                          -4%                     -6%
BM_UnaryPingPong<MinInProcessCHTTP2, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/2M/0                           -7%                     -5%
```

Woah... That can't be correct?

On Tue, Sep 12, 2017, 2:36 PM gRPC Jenkins <notifications@github.com> wrote:
